Text: Senator Bruce McPhersonWe have some very sad news from State Senator Bruce McPherson On Saturday morning his year old son was murdered in San Francisco during an attempted robbery Hunter McPherson will be remembered during a memorial service in Aptos on Wednesday November The family has also set up an athletic scholarship fund in his name We have additional information if you need it Please remember this wonderful family in your thoughts and prayers Lang Hansen OMalley Miller

The ENRON Western Govt Affairs Team Thank youBev asked me to send you all a thank you note for the thoughtful and beautiful flowers She also wanted to let you know that she has another surgery scheduled for this Thursday which will keep her out of the office for another week or so We will keep you posted and thanks again Heather Taylor Lang Hansen OMalley Miller
